Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: bead designs book for jewelers
A book of 62 thin vellum pages bound in heavy parchment. Upon the cover is written in neat script "Bead Designs for Jewelers."
A book bound in heavy parchment. Upon the cover is written in neat script "Bead Designs for Jewelers."

the first page of this bead designs book for jewelers

Written in the same neat script as the cover of this bead designs book are the words "Table of Contents" at the top of the first page. Divided into two columns below in tiny print you see this list: "acacia, acorn, amaryllis, anchor, ankh, baroque, barrel, beehive, berry, bi-cone, boat, butterfly, candy, cauldron, chrysanthemum, cicada, circular, clam, cloud, cross, crown, dragon, dragonfly, elliptical, faceted, fairy, firefly, flat, fleur-de-lis, frog, gorath, hexagram, horseshoe, lantern, leaf, lily, lotus, moon, mushroom, nugget, octogram, octopus, pegasus, pentacle, pillow, pistol, quill, rectangular, rose, round, skull, snowflake, spherical, spiral, square, star, sword, triangular, triquetra, violin, and wing."

Written in the same neat script as the cover of this bead designs book are the words "Table of Contents" at the top of the first page. Divided into two columns below in tiny print you see a list of 62 types of beads.
